review: one of the best movies ever made. i'm so glad i got to watch this masterpiece from ron howard who presents this legendary rivalry between two of the greatest drivers in f1 history nikki lauda and james hunt to absolute perfection and hans zimmer's score (particularly one from the climax) makes it so much more beautiful. it is a compelling and engaging story of two fierce rivals who can't stand watching the other win yet share a mutual admiration towards one another. needless to say, it is one of the finest movies i've ever watched.

i loved this movie. being a lover of cars, motorsports, and f1 this movie was a natural choice for me. they picked the perfect cast to represent the characters. seeing the dynamics of an extravert and an introvert being rivals in the sport was fascinating because their different perspectives and values and reasons for desiring the championship. what a contrast the two character brought to the film. the film showcases some well known race tracks ie monza, nürburgring, fuji raceway and the racing scenes were well done.
